shopcategoriesshophomecanoncashbackitems: cameracentreuk Store NIKON Coolpix Coolpix S6500 Advanced Compact Digital Camera - Red 16 megapixels Sensor type: CMOS Optical zoom: 12x HD video: Full HD 1080p Product details With a CMOS sensor, enhanced lens capabilities and built-in WiFi, the Nikon Coolpix S6500 Advanced Compact Digital Camera has all the tools you need to create breathtaking imagery . Advanced imaging The Coolpix S6500 has incorporated many of the intelligent features that make up costly DSLR cameras, delivered to you in a light, stylish package. The powerful, backlit CMOS sensor delivers superb image clarity, with a 16 MP resolution through a lens with wide-angle coverage and 12x optical zoom. With this impressive compact camera you can also capture precious moments in Full 1080p HD video using the simple recording function which has full sound. Autofocus and lens-shift vibration reduction on the Coolpix work together to deliver images and videos that are crystal-clear and free from blur. Shoot and share With built-in WiFi you can share your latest photos in a flash, for family and friends to enjoy on your favourite social networks. Use your smartphone as a remote for your Coolpix S6500 to make capturing self portraits, easy and hassle-free. Set the scene Let Nikon tailor settings to suit any scene by choosing from a range of exposure modes such as black and white, sports, dusk and dawn, pet portrait, snow and even 3D photography. For close ups, use the macro setting to take in beautiful, precious details with a minimum focusing distance of 8 cm. Capture the beauty of sweeping images or the excitement of a packed party using the Panorama Mode on the Coolpix S6500 . Whether you're using the portrait mode to shoot a friend or the self-timer to get a shot of the whole family, the Glamour Retouch tool will ensure everyone looks their best, from teeth whitening to skin softening. For professional looking images that are easy to achieve and quick to share choose the Nikon Coolpix S6500 Advanced Compact Digital Camera .
